description: '''Josh Scogin''' (born July 17, 1981) is an American musician, and is currently the vocalist and guitarist for [['68 (band)|'68]]. He is also known for being the vocalist for [[The Chariot (band)|The Chariot]], and former vocalist of [[Norma Jean (band)|Norma Jean]] and [[Luti-Kriss]]. Scogin has recorded solo material as A Rose, By Any Other Name, releasing an album in 2010.
